instructions: Open the Google Voice app . At the bottom, tap Call . In the Search box, enter a contact's name or phone number or tap Dial and enter a number. For international calls, enter the country code before the number (for example, add 55 for Brazil).

Open the Google Voice app . At the top left, tap Menu and then Settings . Under Calls , tap Make and receive calls . Select Prefer Wi-Fi and mobile data . (Optional) To turn off Wi-Fi calling, choose the alternative option for your phone's telephone carrier. Start a call from the Google Voice app.
Open Voice . On the left, click Calls . Click Make a call . Enter the name or phone number you want to call. Click Call .
